# AI Trip Planner Prototype - Dependencies
# Minimal dependencies for prototype version

# Core Python libraries (usually included with Python)
# datetime - for date/time handling
# random - for cost estimation variations  
# sys - for system operations

# No external dependencies required for this prototype!
# Future versions will include:
# requests>=2.28.0          # For API calls
# numpy>=1.21.0             # For AI/ML features
# pandas>=1.3.0             # For data processing
# scikit-learn>=1.0.0       # For machine learning
# flask>=2.0.0              # For web interface
# beautifulsoup4>=4.10.0    # For web scraping
# python-dateutil>=2.8.0    # For advanced date handling
